name: db-performance-tester
description: Performance testing application for ClickHouse vs PostgreSQL

scripts.start-dbs: docker rm -f clickhouse-server postgres 2>/dev/null || true && docker run -d --name clickhouse-server --memory=4g --cpus=2 --ulimit nofile=262144:262144 -p 8123:8123 -p 9000:9000 -e CLICKHOUSE_PASSWORD=password clickhouse/clickhouse-server && docker run -d --name postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres -p 5432:5432 --memory=4g --cpus=2 postgres:15
